### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mining Operation at position (41.0, -86.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -86.0) and wooden chest at position (41.5, -84.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (43.0, -86.0) and wooden chest at position (43.5, -84.5)
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -84.5) connecting the two chests

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (4.0, -60.0) and wooden chest at position (4.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, -56.5)

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (-17.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-17.0, -52.0) and wooden chest at position (-16.5, -50.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -51.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-13.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -51.5)

#### Storage and Smelting Area at position (41.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -81.5)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -77.5)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -73.5)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -76.5)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -74.5)
- Stone furnace at position (43.0, -79.0)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Inventory Full Errors
- Ensure inventory has sufficient space before attempting to craft or pick up items. Clear inventory or use chests to store excess items.

#### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure the target position is clear before placing an entity. Remove existing entities if necessary.

#### Crafting Errors
- Check inventory for required materials before attempting to craft. Ensure there is enough space in the inventory for the crafted item.

#### Fuel and Resource Management
- Ensure mining drills and furnaces have sufficient fuel and resources to operate. Regularly check and refill fuel and resource supplies.

#### Chest Management
- Regularly empty full chests to prevent mining operations from halting due to lack of storage space. Distribute items across multiple chests if necessary.
